achievements.name: I'll save you!
achievements.description: Successfully protect someone from being attacked.

achievements.name: Bulletproof
achievements.description: Have your bulletproof vest save you from death.

achievements.name: Tango Down
achievements.description: Kill the Godfather while protecting someone.

achievements.name: Dangerous Work
achievements.description: Die from visiting a Serial Killer

achievements.name: Flawless Executioner
achievements.description: Execute 3 non-town members in a game.

achievements.name: I knew it!
achievements.description: Be killed by the Serial Killer you jailed.

achievements.name: It's a party
achievements.description: Have 5 or more people visit your target.

achievements.name: Incognito
achievements.description: Win without revealing yourself as the Mayor.

achievements.name: Fearless
achievements.description: Reveal yourself as Mayor on day 1.

achievements.name: Faith in the Town
achievements.description: Be acquitted without revealing to the Town.

achievements.name: Not Suspicious
achievements.description: Find someone to not be suspicious.

achievements.name: Busted
achievements.description: Find a member of the Mafia.

achievements.name: Saw it coming!
achievements.description: See a member of the mafia targeting you.

achievements.name: Too Many Mafia
achievements.description: See 4 or more mafia visit people at night.

achievements.name: Perfect Shot
achievements.description: Shoot 3 Non-Town in a single game.

achievements.name: Why Won't They Die?
achievements.description: Shoot 3 people who can't die at night.

achievements.name: Welcome Back Doc
achievements.description: Resurrect a Doctor to heal yourself.

achievements.name: Encore
achievements.description: Resurrect a Sheriff and find someone suspicious.

achievements.name: Second Chance
achievements.description: Resurrect a Bodyguard and defend from an attack.

achievements.name: Lucky Paranoia
achievements.description: Win a game without killing any town members.

achievements.name: Massacre
achievements.description: Kill three people in one night

achievements.name: Not Paranoid
achievements.description: Win without going on alert all game.

achievements.name: Oops
achievements.description: Blackmail a member of the Mafia.

achievements.name: Dangerous Profession
achievements.description: Die to the Serial Killer you visited.

achievements.name: Slippery Chameleon
achievements.description: Successfully disguise your role 3 times in one game.

achievements.name: Master of Deceit
achievements.description: Deceive the Town with a fake role upon your death.

achievements.name: That was pointless
achievements.description: Frame a member of the Mafia.

achievements.name: On Strike
achievements.description: Win the game without cleaning any bodies.

achievements.name: Impossible!
achievements.description: Manage to clean up your own dead body.

achievements.name: Loyal Servant
achievements.description: Win without dying or becoming the Godfather.

achievements.name: I am who I am.
achievements.description: Remember that you were an Amnesiac.

achievements.name: Still Neutral
achievements.description: Remember that you were a Survivor.

achievements.name: Taking Sides
achievements.description: Remember that you were a member of the Mafia.

achievements.name: Disco Inferno
achievements.description: Ignite 5 or more people in one night.

achievements.name: There can be only one.
achievements.description: Ignite a Serial Killer and Godfather in the same night.

achievements.name: Quick Execution
achievements.description: Get your target lynched on day 2.

achievements.name: Popular Target
achievements.description: Be attacked 5 or more times in a game.

achievements.name: Patience, Jackass, Patience
achievements.description: Get your target lynched on day 10 or later.

achievements.name: Dexter Morgan
achievements.description: Kill the Jailor who jailed you.

achievements.name: Bay Harbor Butcher
achievements.description: Kill 5 or more people in one game.

achievements.name: Psychopathic Pact
achievements.description: Win the game with another SerialKiller.

achievements.name: Not Afraid
achievements.description: Win without using a bulletproof vest.

achievements.name: Kevlar
achievements.description: Have your bulletproof vest save you from death.

achievements.name: Two Birds, One Stone
achievements.description: Make a Vigilante shoot another town member.

achievements.name: Double-Edged Sword
achievements.description: Force 2 Town members to die to a Veteran in a game.

achievements.name: Directing the Blade
achievements.description: Control a SerialKiller 5 times in a game.

achievements.name: The Perfect Town
achievements.description: Win with all Town members still alive.

achievements.name: The Sicilian Mafia
achievements.description: Win with all Mafia members still alive.

achievements.name: Close Call
achievements.description: Be acquitted by a tie vote.

achievements.name: Half Way There
achievements.description: Win with half of the Town roles.

achievements.name: Adept of the Town
achievements.description: Win with all of the Town roles.

achievements.name: Discipline for Crime
achievements.description: Win with half of the Mafia roles.

achievements.name: Adept of the Mafia
achievements.description: Win with all of the Mafia roles.

achievements.name: Pacifist in Training
achievements.description: Win with half of the Neutral roles.

achievements.name: Indifferent
achievements.description: Win with all of the Neutral roles.

achievements.name: Fifty-Fifty
achievements.description: Win with half of all roles.

achievements.name: Savage
achievements.description: Win your first game as a Werewolf.

achievements.name: Triple Threat
achievements.description: Kill a Godfather, Arsonist and SerialKiller in the same night.

achievements.name: Jailbreak
achievements.description: Kill the Jailor who jailed you.

achievements.name: Derailed
achievements.description: Forge a will on an Investigator.

achievements.name: Whoops!
achievements.description: Forge a will on a Mafia member.

achievements.name: Fabricate

Blade

achievements.name: Grave Endeavors

achievements.name: Double Vision
achievements.description: See your target visit two people on the same night.

achievements.name: Multi-Trap
achievements.description: Place 3 traps in a single game.

achievements.name: Anti-Magic Trap

achievements.name: The Sight
achievements.description: Have 6 visions in a single game.

achievements.name: Blinded by Love
achievements.description: Be role blocked 3 times in a single game.

achievements.name: Surgical Precision
achievements.description: Ambush a Doctor who visits your target.

achievements.name: A Fatal Error
achievements.description: Ambush a Werewolf who visits your target.

achievements.name: From Beyond the Grave
achievements.description: Save your target when you are dead.

achievements.name: Revitalized

achievements.name: But You Have Heard of Me
A Virulent Plague
achievements.description: Have all the living players infected on day 5.

achievements.name: A God Among Us
achievements.description: Become Pestilence, Horseman of the Apocaylpse.

achievements.name: Unholy Strike
achievements.description: Attack 5 players in a single night.

achievements.name: Invincible
achievements.description: Have a Jailor try to execute you.

achievements.name: An Unstoppable Force Meets an Invincible Object

achievements.name: Whammied
achievements.description: Kill 5 players as the Hex Master

achievements.name: Last Meal
achievements.description: Have a jailed player die to your poison.

achievements.name: Delayed Paranoia
achievements.description: Have a Veteran on alert die to your poison.

achievements.name: Natural Remedies

achievements.name: The Trifecta
achievements.description: Use all three potions in a single game.

achievements.name: A Rockin Party

achievements.name: Stone Wall
achievements.description: Turn a revealed Mayor to stone.

achievements.name: Blood Moon
achievements.description: Reanimate a Werewolf on the Full Moon.

achievements.name: Revived and Rejuvenated

achievements.name: A Helping Hand
achievements.description: Control a player into Medusa's gaze.

achievements.name: Influenced Infection

achievements.name: Kill Command
